title.raw: 《循吏列傳》 Biographies of Upright Officials

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：法令所以導民也，刑罰所以禁姦也。

translations.literal: The Grand Historian said: Laws and commands guide the people, punishments prohibit wickedness.

sentences.zh: 文武不備，良民懼然身修者，官未曾亂也。

translations.literal: If culture and martial force are not complete, good people will fear and cultivate themselves, officials have never been disorderly.

sentences.zh: 奉職循理，亦可以為治，何必威嚴哉？

translations.literal: Devoted to duty and following principle, one can also govern, why must it be severe?

The Grand Historian said: Laws and commands guide the people, punishments prohibit wickedness. If culture and martial force are not complete, good people will fear and cultivate themselves, officials have never been disorderly. Devoted to duty and following principle, one can also govern, why must it be severe?

sentences.zh: 孫叔敖者，楚之處士也。

translations.literal: Sun Shu Ao was a Chu recluse.

sentences.zh: 虞丘相進之於楚莊王，以自代也。

translations.literal: Yu Qiu Xiang recommended him to Chu Zhuang Wang to replace himself.

sentences.zh: 三月為楚相，施教導民，上下和合，世俗盛美，政緩禁止，吏無姦邪，盜賊不起。

translations.literal: Three months as Chu prime minister, he implemented teachings to guide the people, superiors and inferiors harmonized, customs flourished beautifully, government was relaxed yet prohibitions held, officials had no wickedness, thieves did not arise.

sentences.zh: 秋冬則勸民山採，春夏以水，各得其所便，民皆樂其生。

translations.literal: In autumn and winter he urged people to gather in mountains, in spring and summer by water, each getting what was convenient, people all delighted in their livelihood.

Sun Shu Ao was a Chu recluse. Yu Qiu Xiang recommended him to Chu Zhuang Wang to replace himself. Three months as Chu prime minister, he implemented teachings to guide the people, superiors and inferiors harmonized, customs flourished beautifully, government was relaxed yet prohibitions held, officials had no wickedness, thieves did not arise. In autumn and winter he urged people to gather in mountains, in spring and summer by water, each getting what was convenient, people all delighted in their livelihood.

sentences.zh: 莊王以為幣輕，更以小為大，百姓不便，皆去其業。

translations.literal: Zhuang Wang thought the currency was light, changed small to large, people were inconvenienced, all abandoned their occupations.

sentences.zh: 市令言之相曰：「市亂，民莫安其處，次行不定。」

translations.literal: The market official spoke to the prime minister: 'Market is chaotic, people cannot settle in their places, traders cannot establish their businesses.'

sentences.zh: 相曰：「如此幾何頃乎？」

translations.literal: Prime minister said: 'How long has this been?'

sentences.zh: 市令曰：「三月頃。」

translations.literal: Market official said: 'About three months.'

sentences.zh: 相曰：「罷，吾今令之復矣。」

translations.literal: Prime minister said: 'Stop, I will now order it restored.'

sentences.zh: 後五日，朝，相言之王曰：「前日更幣，以為輕。

translations.literal: After five days, at court, prime minister spoke to the king: 'Previously changing currency because it was light.

sentences.zh: 今市令來言曰『市亂，民莫安其處，次行之不定』。

translations.literal: Now market official comes saying 'market chaotic, people cannot settle in places, traders cannot establish businesses'.

sentences.zh: 臣請遂令復如故。」

translations.literal: I request to then order restoration as before.'

sentences.zh: 王許之，下令三日而市復如故。

translations.literal: King allowed it, issued order three days and market restored as before.

Zhuang Wang thought the currency was light, changed small to large, people were inconvenienced, all abandoned their occupations. The market official spoke to the prime minister: 'Market is chaotic, people cannot settle in their places, traders cannot establish their businesses.' Prime minister said: 'How long has this been?' Market official said: 'About three months.' Prime minister said: 'Stop, I will now order it restored.' After five days, at court, prime minister spoke to the king: 'Previously changing currency because it was light. Now market official comes saying 'market chaotic, people cannot settle in places, traders cannot establish businesses'. I request to then order restoration as before.' King allowed it, issued order three days and market restored as before.

sentences.zh: 楚民俗好庳車，王以為庳車不便馬，欲下令使高之。

translations.literal: Chu people custom liked low chariots, king thought low chariots inconvenienced horses, wished to issue order to raise them.

sentences.zh: 相曰：「令數下，民不知所從，不可。

translations.literal: Prime minister said: 'Orders issued frequently, people do not know what to follow, cannot.

sentences.zh: 王必欲高車，臣請教閭里使高其梱。

translations.literal: If king must raise chariots, I request to teach neighborhoods to raise their axles.

sentences.zh: 乘車者皆君子，君子不能數下車。」

translations.literal: Riders are all gentlemen, gentlemen cannot frequently alight from chariots.'

sentences.zh: 王許之。

translations.literal: King allowed it.

sentences.zh: 居半歲，民悉自高其車。

translations.literal: After half a year, people all raised their own chariots.

Chu people custom liked low chariots, king thought low chariots inconvenienced horses, wished to issue order to raise them. Prime minister said: 'Orders issued frequently, people do not know what to follow, cannot. If king must raise chariots, I request to teach neighborhoods to raise their axles. Riders are all gentlemen, gentlemen cannot frequently alight from chariots.' King allowed it. After half a year, people all raised their own chariots.

sentences.zh: 此不教而民從其化，近者視而效之，遠者四面望而法之。

translations.literal: This did not teach yet people followed their transformation, near ones saw and imitated, far ones from four sides gazed and modeled after.

sentences.zh: 故三得相而不喜，知其材自得之也；

translations.literal: Therefore three times obtained prime minister yet not happy, knew his talent self-obtained;

sentences.zh: 三去相而不悔，知非己之罪也。

translations.literal: Three times left prime minister yet not regretted, knew not his own crime.

This did not teach yet people followed their transformation, near ones saw and imitated, far ones from four sides gazed and modeled after. Therefore three times obtained prime minister yet not happy, knew his talent self-obtained; Three times left prime minister yet not regretted, knew not his own crime.

sentences.zh: 子產者，鄭之列大夫也。

translations.literal: Zi Chan was Zheng's ranking grand master.

sentences.zh: 鄭昭君之時，以所愛徐摯為相，國亂，上下不親，父子不和。

translations.literal: During Zheng Zhao Jun's time, because he favored Xu Zhi as prime minister, state was chaotic, superiors and inferiors not close, fathers and sons not harmonious.

sentences.zh: 大宮子期言之君，以子產為相。

translations.literal: Da Gong Zi Qi spoke to the jun, made Zi Chan prime minister.

sentences.zh: 為相一年，豎子不戲狎，斑白不提挈，僮子不犁畔。

translations.literal: As prime minister one year, youths did not play improperly, elderly did not carry burdens, children did not plow boundaries.

sentences.zh: 二年，市不豫賈。

translations.literal: Two years, market not falsely priced.

sentences.zh: 三年，門不夜關，道不拾遺。

translations.literal: Three years, gates not closed at night, roads not picked up lost items.

sentences.zh: 四年，田器不歸。

translations.literal: Four years, farming tools not returned.

sentences.zh: 五年，士無尺籍，喪期不令而治。

translations.literal: Five years, scholars no false records, mourning periods not commanded yet orderly.

sentences.zh: 治鄭二十六年而死，丁壯號哭，老人兒啼，曰：「子產去我死乎！

translations.literal: Governed Zheng twenty six years and died, able-bodied men wailed, elders wept like children, said: 'Zi Chan leaves us to die!

sentences.zh: 民將安歸？」

translations.literal: People will go where?'

Zi Chan was Zheng's ranking grand master. During Zheng Zhao Jun's time, because he favored Xu Zhi as prime minister, state was chaotic, superiors and inferiors not close, fathers and sons not harmonious. Da Gong Zi Qi spoke to the jun, made Zi Chan prime minister. As prime minister one year, youths did not play improperly, elderly did not carry burdens, children did not plow boundaries. Two years, market not falsely priced. Three years, gates not closed at night, roads not picked up lost items. Four years, farming tools not returned. Five years, scholars no false records, mourning periods not commanded yet orderly. Governed Zheng twenty six years and died, able-bodied men wailed, elders wept like children, said: 'Zi Chan leaves us to die! People will go where?'

sentences.zh: 公儀休者，魯博士也。

translations.literal: Gong Yi Xiu was a Lu doctor.

sentences.zh: 以高弟為魯相。

translations.literal: With high merit became Lu prime minister.

sentences.zh: 奉法循理，無所變更，百官自正。

translations.literal: Devoted to law following principle, no changes, hundred officials self-corrected.

sentences.zh: 使食祿者不得與下民爭利，受大者不得取小。

translations.literal: Made salary receivers not compete with common people for profit, receiving great not take small.

Gong Yi Xiu was a Lu doctor. With high merit became Lu prime minister. Devoted to law following principle, no changes, hundred officials self-corrected. Made salary receivers not compete with common people for profit, receiving great not take small.

sentences.zh: 客有遺相魚者，相不受。

translations.literal: Guest had one who gifted prime minister fish, prime minister not receive.

sentences.zh: 客曰：「聞君嗜魚，遺君魚，何故不受也？」

translations.literal: Guest said: 'Heard jun likes fish, gifted jun fish, why not receive?'

sentences.zh: 相曰：「以嗜魚，故不受也。

translations.literal: Prime minister said: 'Because like fish, therefore not receive.

sentences.zh: 今為相，能自給魚；

translations.literal: Now as prime minister, can self-supply fish;

sentences.zh: 今受魚而免，誰復給我魚者？

translations.literal: Now receive fish and resign, who again supply me fish?

sentences.zh: 吾故不受也。」

translations.literal: I therefore not receive.'

Guest had one who gifted prime minister fish, prime minister not receive. Guest said: 'Heard jun likes fish, gifted jun fish, why not receive?' Prime minister said: 'Because like fish, therefore not receive. Now as prime minister, can self-supply fish; Now receive fish and resign, who again supply me fish? I therefore not receive.'

sentences.zh: 食茹而美，拔其園葵而棄之。

translations.literal: Ate greens yet beautiful, pulled his garden mallows and abandoned them.

sentences.zh: 見其家織布好，而疾出其家婦，燔其機，云「欲令農士工女安所讎其貨乎」？

translations.literal: Saw his family weave cloth well, and angrily expelled his family woman, burned her loom, said 'want to make farmers scholars artisans women where sell their goods?'

Ate greens yet beautiful, pulled his garden mallows and abandoned them. Saw his family weave cloth well, and angrily expelled his family woman, burned her loom, said 'want to make farmers scholars artisans women where sell their goods?'

sentences.zh: 石奢者，楚昭王相也。

translations.literal: Shi She was Chu Zhao Wang's prime minister.

sentences.zh: 堅直廉正，無所阿避。

translations.literal: Firm upright incorruptible, no partiality avoidance.

sentences.zh: 行縣，道有殺人者，相追之，乃其父也。

translations.literal: Patrolling commandery, road had murderer, prime minister pursued, was his father.

sentences.zh: 縱其父而還自系焉。

translations.literal: Released his father and returned self-bound.

sentences.zh: 使人言之王曰：「殺人者，臣之父也。

translations.literal: Made person speak to wang: 'Murderer, minister's father.

sentences.zh: 夫以父立政，不孝也；

translations.literal: With father establish politics, not filial;

sentences.zh: 廢法縱罪，非忠也；

translations.literal: Waste law release crime, not loyal;

sentences.zh: 臣罪當死。」

translations.literal: Minister crime deserves death.'

sentences.zh: 王曰：「追而不及，不當伏罪，子其治事矣。」

translations.literal: Wang said: 'Pursued yet not caught, should not bear crime, son manage affairs.'

sentences.zh: 石奢曰：「不私其父，非孝子也；

translations.literal: Shi She said: 'Not favor own father, not filial son;

sentences.zh: 不奉主法，非忠臣也。

translations.literal: Not follow jun law, not loyal minister.

sentences.zh: 王赦其罪，上惠也；

translations.literal: Wang pardon his crime, upper benevolence;

sentences.zh: 伏誅而死，臣職也。」

translations.literal: Bear execution die, minister duty.'

sentences.zh: 遂不受令，自刎而死。

translations.literal: Then not accept order, self-cut throat die.

Shi She was Chu Zhao Wang's prime minister. Firm upright incorruptible, no partiality avoidance. Patrolling commandery, road had murderer, prime minister pursued, was his father. Released his father and returned self-bound. Made person speak to wang: 'Murderer, minister's father. With father establish politics, not filial; Waste law release crime, not loyal; Minister crime deserves death.' Wang said: 'Pursued yet not caught, should not bear crime, son manage affairs.' Shi She said: 'Not favor own father, not filial son; Not follow jun law, not loyal minister. Wang pardon his crime, upper benevolence; Bear execution die, minister duty.' Then not accept order, self-cut throat die.

sentences.zh: 李離者，晉文公之理也。

translations.literal: Li Li was Jin Wen Gong's judge.

sentences.zh: 過聽殺人，自拘當死。

translations.literal: Mistakenly heard killed person, self-bound deserved death.

sentences.zh: 文公曰：「官有貴賤，罰有輕重。

translations.literal: Wen Gong said: 'Official has noble base, punishment has light heavy.

sentences.zh: 下吏有過，非子之罪也。」

translations.literal: Lower official has error, not son's crime.'

sentences.zh: 李離曰：「臣居官為長，不與吏讓位；

translations.literal: Li Li said: 'Minister dwell official as chief, not with officials yield position;

sentences.zh: 受祿為多，不與下分利。

translations.literal: Receive salary as many, not with below divide profit.

sentences.zh: 今過聽殺人，傅其罪下吏，非所聞也。」

translations.literal: Now mistaken heard kill person, shift crime to lower official, not what heard.'

sentences.zh: 辭不受令。

translations.literal: Declined not accept order.

sentences.zh: 文公曰：「子則自以為有罪，寡人亦有罪邪？」

translations.literal: Wen Gong said: 'Son then self consider have crime, sha ren also have crime?'

sentences.zh: 李離曰：「理有法，失刑則刑，失死則死。

translations.literal: Li Li said: 'Judge has law, lose punishment then punish, lose death then death.

sentences.zh: 公以臣能聽微決疑，故使為理。

translations.literal: Gong with minister able listen subtle decide doubt, therefore make judge.

sentences.zh: 今過聽殺人，罪當死。」

translations.literal: Now mistaken heard kill person, crime deserves death.'

sentences.zh: 遂不受令，伏劍而死。

translations.literal: Then not accept order, prostrate sword die.

Li Li was Jin Wen Gong's judge. Mistakenly heard killed person, self-bound deserved death. Wen Gong said: 'Official has noble base, punishment has light heavy. Lower official has error, not son's crime.' Li Li said: 'Minister dwell official as chief, not with officials yield position; Receive salary as many, not with below divide profit. Now mistaken heard kill person, shift crime to lower official, not what heard.' Declined not accept order. Wen Gong said: 'Son then self consider have crime, sha ren also have crime?' Li Li said: 'Judge has law, lose punishment then punish, lose death then death. Gong with minister able listen subtle decide doubt, therefore make judge. Now mistaken heard kill person, crime deserves death.' Then not accept order, prostrate sword die.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：孫叔敖出一言，郢市復。

translations.literal: Grand Historian said: Sun Shu Ao exit one word, Ying market restore.

sentences.zh: 子產病死，鄭民號哭。

translations.literal: Zi Chan sick die, Zheng people wail cry.

sentences.zh: 公儀子見好布而家婦逐。

translations.literal: Gong Yi Zi see good cloth yet family woman expel.

sentences.zh: 石奢縱父而死，楚昭名立。

translations.literal: Shi She release father yet die, Chu Zhao name establish.

sentences.zh: 李離過殺而伏劍，晉文以正國法。

translations.literal: Li Li mistaken kill yet prostrate sword, Jin Wen with correct state law.

Grand Historian said: Sun Shu Ao exit one word, Ying market restore. Zi Chan sick die, Zheng people wail cry. Gong Yi Zi see good cloth yet family woman expel. Shi She release father yet die, Chu Zhao name establish. Li Li mistaken kill yet prostrate sword, Jin Wen with correct state law.
